duties_responsibilities.duty: Process financial transactions promptly and accurately, strictly adhering to all bank policies and procedures.
Prioritize client demands and provide impeccable customer service.
Participate in job-specific training, various bank training programs, and comply with BSA, AML, and all bank policies and procedures.
Maintain a high level of confidentiality and demonstrate computer proficiency with Microsoft programs.
Stand for most of the workday, handle frequent interruptions, and work flexible/extended hours as business requires.
Manage heavy boxes or bags of currency and coin weighing up to 60 pounds.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED, Bachelor’s Degree or 6 months previous teller experience within the financial institution industry, or 6 months previous cash handling experience in a retail customer service environment.
